```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
metadata.path <- "/fs/scratch/PAS1695/projects/exoN/data/metadata/raw"
files <- list.files(path = metadata.path,
                    full.names = TRUE)
files
```


```{r}
cl <- read.csv(files[grepl("Clinical_Specimen_Linkage_Data", files)])

dim(cl)
head(cl)
```

There are about a thousand RNA-seq samples.

```{r}
rnaseq <- 
  cl %>%
  filter(!grepl("^$", RNASeq))
dim(rnaseq)
```

```{r}
table(rnaseq$Disease.Type)
```
